member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.DisplayResultsButton_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary:
Event-handling method for the Click event of the displayResults button.
This method retrieves the query criteria entered by the user on the form and then calls the CreateQuery method to generate an enumerable result set.
The results are formatted by using the FormatResults method, and are then displayed in the results TextBox control on the form.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.CreateQuery(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Method that generates an enumerable collection of TestResult items from the stressData binary tree, based on the criteria specified by the user. All data fetched will fall within the range specified by these criteria.
member.returns: An IEnumerable<TestResult> object that can be used to iterate through the results.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.FormatResults(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{StressTestResult.TestResult})
member.summary: Fetch the data defined by the LINQ query specified as the parameter and format the results as a string.
member.returns: A formatted string that contains the data fetched by the query.
